ARABIC: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is not the word of a poet - how little iman you have!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And not the word of a poet. How little is it that you believe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: not the speech of a poet. Little do you believe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is not the word of a poet but only a few of you have faith,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And it is not the speech of a poet; how little do you believe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It is not the word of a poet, little is that you believe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And it is not the word of a poet; little is it that you believe;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is not the speech of a poet (little do you believe)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It is not poet's speech - little is it that ye believe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it is not the word of a poet -- how little you believe! --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And it is not the speech of a poet. Little it is that ye believe
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and it is not the speech of a poet. Little is the faith that you have!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is not the word of a poet: little it is ye believe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It is not the word of a poet, little is that you believe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is not the speech of a poet little do you believe
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And it is not the speech of a poet—little do you believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:41] And it is not the speech of a poet. Little do you believe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It) i.e. the Qur'an (is not poet's speech) that a poet composes (little is it that ye believe!) He says: you do not believe in little or much.
